intro: Stylocoryna celebica, commonly known as the Celebes starleaf, is a flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae and is characterized by its striking, star-shaped leaves that are often brightly colored. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers clustered in a cup-like structure called a cyathium, typical of the Euphorbiaceae family. Stylocoryna celebica is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Its unique foliage makes it a popular ornamental plant in horticulture.
